nodes.text: Nicole Love is the Senior Manager of Production and Design for Lucas Online, whose work includes StarWars.com, LucasArts.com, IndianaJones.com, Lucasfilm.com, ILM.com, SkySound.com, THX1138movie.com, and more.
The comic strip Reversal of Fortune featured a character named Nikki Vul, a female Human who worked as a HoloNet news reporter near the end of the Clone Wars. She was named after Love.
